name: They Hear You - Ludem Dare 48
description:
Ludem Dare link:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/they-hear-you

They can hear you! The only way to survive is to go deeper! How far can you go before they catch you? 

Will you play slow and stealthy 

or 

Will you dodge and weave your way through hordes of moles? 

Features:

 - Procedurally generated dungeons!

 - you will never play the same floor twice! 

- Reactive AI that responds to stimuli like sound or vision! 

- Manually inserted pixels to create sprites and artwork 

- Multiple electric sound tracks and Sfx to keep you company - it is dangerous to go alone!

 Controls:

 - WASD or arrow keys to move 

- Ctrl or c to toggle stealth 

- Hold shift to run 

- Space to stomp attract moles from large area and show the way!
